t: how do I remove my brand from brand registry?
s: I've tried going back and forth with Amazon seller support and Amazon brand registry. They are useless. ... "We regret to inform you that as per our recent policy changes, we are no longer servicing requests to remove a Brand or a Seller from the Brand Registry Program.
I've tried to contact both brand registry support and seller support through caselogs with no help. They tell me only to remove the users from the brand registry.

My brand has been removed by Amazon
s: My brand has been removed by Amazon for nearly three months, during which time I have submitted a POA and passed the brand video review. However, so far Amazon has not restored my brand and deleted a listing under that brand, which has brought great risks and losses to my operations.
